title: Palamino or Palette like font
content:
It's logo metal packaging company from Romania. Font like a Palomino or Palette, but some letter different, «M» for example.  
I need help: what is this font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [img081.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620212639/http:/typophile.com/files/img081.jpg) | 105.38 KB |
author: arr

comments.content:
My pick would be:  
Yes:Union (free font)  
distorted horizontally.

... "of course" because I wrote an extensive book about Excoffon...

so I know the font quite well. wasn't meant to be rude :-/

[http://www.amazon.fr/Roger-Excoffon-Le-gentleman-typographe/dp/2911220390](http://web.archive.org/web/20130620212639/http:/www.amazon.fr/Roger-Excoffon-Le-gentleman-typographe/dp/2911220390 "http://www.amazon.fr/Roger-Excoffon-Le-gentleman-typographe/dp/2911220390")
